author: Daniel Dale
title: Fact-checking the first two days of CPAC

author: David Smith
title: The strange Republican world where the big lie lives on and Trump is fighting to save democracy

sentence: Rep. Jim Jordan (R-Ohio) said he hoped Trump would run again, while Ohio Senate candidate Josh Mandel declared Trump the winner of the 2020 election.
author: Liz Skalka
title: Conservatives Are Warming To The Idea Of A Post-Trump GOP

sentence: And while some CPAC speakers did promulgate “the big lie” – Ohio Senate hopeful Josh Mandel declared, “I want to say it very clearly and very directly: I believe this election was stolen from Donald J Trump” – they generally gave greater emphasis to winning Congress in 2022 and, of course, Trump returning to the White House in 2024.
author: David Smith
title: Trump ignores Farage – and risks midterm elections farrago – with insistence on big lie
